Welcome to IGTech

Offshore Recruitment Process Outsourcing, simply put, is the transfer of onshore recruitment process elements to an offshore service provider. Given today's workforce, almost 95% of the world's most dynamic employees cannot be reached using conventional methods – as an alternative to the "you find us" technique, it's imperative to apply the "we'll find you" system where you can identify a pool of candidates for the right job. For this, however, you need to use the services of a competent Human Resource Outsourcing (HRO) company who will help boost the efficiency and quality of your HR services and contribute to its success. And that's specifically what we at IGTech do for you!

Based in Mumbai, India IGTech is the leading provider of Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) services to the International Recruitment Market. Combining speed, competence, flexibility, professional attitude along with lower costs and modern technology, our offshore staffing agents ensure to furnish the ideal contenders for your firm. Resume screening, resume processing, candidate generation, name generation, vacancy monitoring and Internet sourcing are to name just a few from the array of services we proffer. We realize that outsourcing human resources can alter a business's HR department from a cost center to a strategic resource. Our recruiter hiring feature will relieve you from several insignificant tasks and assist you to focus on networking and relationship building to hire more applicants! Furthermore, our hiring recruiters employ the best Internet sources and use their experience to recognize active and passive candidates in order to reduce your time and effort.

Benefits

Offshore Recruitment Process Outsourcing (oRPO) with IGTech

You save between 50% to 75% of your total cost as compared to employing an onshore recruiter or administrator

Your recruiting capabilities increase tremendously without affecting your headcount

Speed of hire and candidate yield perk up

Quality of hire improves as your internal recruiting staff have more time to spend with quality contenders

IGTech proficient Internet Researchers and eRecruiters make use of searching skills and staffing tools to find deserving candidates

We achieve our goals in time with zeal, devotion, commitment, responsibility, determination and action. Team up with IGTech to make a noteworthy impact on your bottom line while noticeably increasing your recruiting efficacy. Contact our recruitment support or home staffing agent to know more about us. At IGTech, you can always count on us…
